text: The Ivory Coast national under-17 football team represents Ivory Coast in youth international football completions. They have attended the FIFA U-17 World Cup five times with its best placing being third place in 1987. ==Tournament Records== === FIFA U-16 and U-17 World Cup record === FIFA U-16 and U-17 World Cup
